verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%> man that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> that is on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%> But he <S%H5046>told<s%> not his <S%H1>father.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3427>tarried<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> tree <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H4051>Migron:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%>

And <S%H281>Ahiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> <S%H350>Ichabod's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H5375>wearing<s%> an <S%H646>ephod.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

And <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4569>passages,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> there was a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H5676>side,<s%> and a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H5676>side:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H949>Bozez,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5573>Seneh.<s%>

The <S%H8127>forefront<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H4690>situate<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%> man that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised:<s%> it may be that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> for us: for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4622>restraint<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by <S%H4592>few.<s%>

And his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H3824>heart:<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> you; <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I am with you according to your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to these <S%H582>men,<s%> and we will <S%H1540>discover<s%> ourselves to them.

<S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> to us, <S%H1826>Tarry<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H5060>come<s%> to you; then we will <S%H5975>stand<s%> still in our <S%H8478>place,<s%> and will not <S%H5927>go<s%> up to them.

But <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> <S%H5927>Come<s%> up to us; then we will <S%H5927>go<s%> up: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into our <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to us.

And both of them <S%H1540>discovered<s%> themselves to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H2356>holes<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4675>garrison<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>Come<s%> up to us, and we will <S%H3045>show<s%> you a <S%H1697>thing.<s%> And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5927>Come<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> me: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5927>climbed<s%> up on his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and on his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him: and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan;<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H4191>slew<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And that <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5221>made,<s%> was about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> within as it were an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4618>acre<s%> of <S%H7704>land,<s%> which a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen might plow.

And there was <S%H2731>trembling<s%> in the <S%H4264>host,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> and the <S%H7843>spoilers,<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2729>trembled,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quaked:<s%> so it was a <S%H430>very<s%> <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2731>trembling.<s%>

And the <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>looked;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H4127>melted<s%> away, and they <S%H3212>went<s%> on <S%H1986>beating<s%> down one another.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, <S%H6485>Number<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H1980>gone<s%> from us. And when they had <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> were not there.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H281>Ahiah,<s%> <S%H5066>Bring<s%> <S%H5066>here<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> For the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was at that <S%H3117>time<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H5704>while<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that the <S%H1995>noise<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> on and <S%H7227>increased:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H622>Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him <S%H2199>assembled<s%> themselves, and they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> was against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> and there was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>discomfiture.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> that were with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H865>before<s%> that <S%H8032>time,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with them into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from the country <S%H5439>round<s%> about, even they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> to be with the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> that were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan.<s%>

Likewise <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which had <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> even they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1692>followed<s%> <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H1007>Bethaven.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H422>adjured<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> that I may be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on my <S%H341>enemies.<s%> So <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2938>tasted<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> they of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H3293>wood;<s%> and there was <S%H1706>honey<s%> on the <S%H7704>ground.<s%>

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3293>wood,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> <S%H1982>dropped;<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H5381>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

But <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> not when his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7650>charged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H7650>oath:<s%> why he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> it in an <S%H3295>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H1706><s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H215>enlightened.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> one of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%> straightly <S%H7650>charged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5774>faint.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> My <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H5916>troubled<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3588>how<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have been <S%H215>enlightened,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H2938>tasted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H637>more,<s%> <S%H3863>if<s%> <S%H3863>haply<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> freely to <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H4672>found?<s%> for had there not been <S%H6258>now<s%> a much <S%H7235>greater<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> to <S%H357>Aijalon:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5774>faint.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>flew<s%> on the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H1121>calves,<s%> <S%H1242><s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> them on the <S%H776>ground:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in that they <S%H398>eat<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You have <S%H898>transgressed:<s%> <S%H1556>roll<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to me this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6327>Disperse<s%> yourselves among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H5066>Bring<s%> me <S%H5066>here<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> them <S%H2088>here,<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> not against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H398>eating<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> with him that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the same was the <S%H2490>first<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that he <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H962>spoil<s%> them <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and let us not <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of them. And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you. Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> Let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> counsel of <S%H430>God,<s%> Shall I <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> But he <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Draw you <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H1988>here,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6438>chief<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>wherein<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> which <S%H3467>saves<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> it be in <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%> But there was not a man among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H6030>answered<s%> him.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Be you on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5676>side,<s%> and I and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> will be on the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> what <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you.

Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> lot. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> were <S%H3920>taken:<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>escaped.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5307>Cast<s%> lots <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%> And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>
